imdb.plot outline: Inspired by true events, Relatos de un Sueño Americano tells the harsh, emotional, and inspiring stories of brave individuals and families who immigrate to the United States. Each hour-long episode narrates the unique journey individuals experience after leaving their countries, families, and possessions behind in search of a better future and pursuit of the American dream.
imdb.title: Relatos de un sueño americano
akas: Relatos de un sueño americano (United States)
plot: Inspired by true events, Relatos de un Sueño Americano tells the harsh, emotional, and inspiring stories of brave individuals and families who immigrate to the United States. Each hour-long episode narrates the unique journey individuals experience after leaving their countries, families, and possessions behind in search of a better future and pursuit of the American dream.
